articles.title: Heart attack: Are your nails clubbed? The nail condition could be warning you’re at risk - Express
articles.description: HEART attack is a medical emergency that is widely feared for its lack of warning signs. Researchers believe, however, that certain physiological changes may occur years before an event. Nail clubbing, for instance, may be a lesser-known risk factor.
